HostLib
- Name: HostLib
- Version: 03.00.01
- License: Apache-2.0
- Format: source code
- Description: Contains communication protocol stack, A71CH/SE050/SE051 APIs, etc.
- Origin: Copyright 2020 NXP
- Location: \hostlib

- Name: Demos
- Version: 02.17.00
- License: Apache-2.0
- Format: source code
- Description: Contains examples using A71CH/SE050/SE051.
- Origin: Copyright 2020 NXP
- Location: \demos

- Name: PyCli
- Version: 03.00.05
- License: Apache-2.0
- Format: source code
- Description: Python based command line tool to access secure element.
- Origin: Copyright 2020 NXP
- Location: \pycli

SSS Apis
- Name: SSS
- Version: 03.04.00
- License: Apache-2.0
- Format: source code
- Description: Contains the **SSS APIs** interface to the Application Layer.
- Origin: Copyright 2020 NXP
- Location: \sss
